T04bsa047_u:405: ata eva āryasaṃdhinirvocanādau dānādaya uttarottaratvena varṇitāḥ /
T04bsa047_u:407: praṇāmādikaṃ kṛtvā pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ vidhāya sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇāśayo
T04bsa047_u:408: mahākaruṇām evābhimukhīkṛtya kāyam ṛjuṃ praṇidhāya sukhāsanopaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya
T04bsa047_u:410: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yad vastu vicārayitavyaṃ yāvatā prakāreṇa saṅkṣepataḥ sakalavastusaṅgraho bhavati tatra cittaṃ badhnīyat /
T04bsa047_u:413: etaccādikarmikasya vikṣepadoṣaparihārārtha saṃkṣiptaṃ tāvad yuktam ālambayitum /
T04bsa047_u:414: yadā tu jitamanaskāro bhavati tadā skandhadhātvādibhedena viśodhya vistaraśo 'pyālambata eva /
T04bsa047_u:415: tathā sandhinirmocanādau yoginām aṣṭādaśaprakāraśūnyatālambanādibhedena nānāprakāram ālambanam uktam /
T04bsa047_u:416: atraiva bhagavatā sattvānugrahād rūpyarūpyādibhedena saṃkṣepamadhyavistāraiḥ vastubhedo 'bhidharmādau nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:418: tato niścitya sarvaṃ vastusaṅgrahaṃ tatraiva punaścittaṃ prabandhena prerayet /
T04bsa047_u:419: yada tvantarā rāgādinā cittaṃ bahirvikṣipet tadāvagamya vikṣepatām aśubhādibhāvanayā vikṣepam upaśāmya punastatraivoparyupari cittaṃ prerayet
T04bsa047_u:424: atha yadā styānamiddhābhibhavād āalambanagrahaṇāprakaṭatayālīnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati tadā
T04bsa047_u:427: atha yadā pūrvahasitaramitādyanusmarato 'ntarā cittam uddhataṃ paśyet,
T04bsa047_u:430: atha yadā layauddhatyabhyāṃ viviktatayā samapravṛttaṃ svarasavāhicittaṃ paśyet tadābhogaśithīlīkaraṇād (Bhk 183) upekṣate /
T04bsa047_u:433: yadā tu tatrālambane 'nabhisaṃskāravāhi yāvadicchaṃ cittaṃ pravṛttaṃ bhavati,
T04bsa047_u:439: ayaṃ ca śamathamārgo bhagavatā āryaprajñāpāramitādau nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:465: eṣa caiṣāṃ padānām arthaḥ pūrvācāryaiḥ maitreyeṇa ca vyākhyātaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:466: saṃkṣepeṇa sarvasaiva samādheḥ ṣaḍ doṣā bhavanti /
T04bsa047_u:480: tathā hi- samādherguṇeṣvabhisampratyayalakṣaṇayā śraddhayā tatra yogino 'bhilāṣa utpadyate /
T04bsa047_u:488: layauddhatyāpraśamanakāle tvanābhogadoṣaḥ tatpratipakṣeṇa ca cetanā bhāvanīyā /
T04bsa047_u:489: layauddhatyapraśame sati yadā cittaṃ praśamavāhi tadābhogadoṣaḥ,
T04bsa047_u:491: ebhiraṣṭābhiḥ prahāṇasaṃskāraiḥ samanvāgataḥ samādhiḥ paramakarmaṇyo bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:493: ata evoktaṃ sūtra- “[aṣṭa]prahāṇa [saṃskāra]samanvāgataḥ ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati” iti /
T04bsa047_u:494: eṣā ca cittaikāgratā uttarottarakarmaṇyatāsamprayogād ālambanādiguṇaviśeṣayogācca dhyānārūpisamāpattiḥ vimokṣādivyapadeśaṃ labhate /
T04bsa047_u:495: tathā hi yadopekṣāvedanāsamprayuktā savitarkasavicārā sā bhavati,
T04bsa047_u:497: yadā ca kāmatṛṣṇayā pāpadharmaiśca] viviktā bhavati [vitarkavicāra]prītisukhādhyātmasamprasādaiḥ samprayuktā bhavati,
T04bsa047_u:500: yadā vitarkavicārarahitā prathamadhyānabhūmitṛṣṇayā viviktā ca bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:513: anyathā hi tīrthikānāmiva samādhimātreṇa kleśaprahāṇaṃ na syāt /
T04bsa047_u:515: kiñcāpi bhāvayet samādhimetaṃ na co bibhāveyya sā ātmasaṃjñām /
T04bsa047_u:516: punaḥ prakupyati kileṣu tasya yathodrakasyeha samādhibhāvanā // iti /
T04bsa047_u:523: jñānaṃ nirātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāse na paśyati // iti /
T04bsa047_u:524: tatrāyamarthaḥ- prathamaṃ yogī ye rūpiṇo dharmā bāhyārthatayā paraiḥ parikalpitāsteṣu tāvad vicārayet /
T04bsa047_u:529: paramāṇūṃśca bhāgaśaḥ pratyavekṣa- māṇo yogī tān arthānna samanupaśyati /
T04bsa047_u:530: tasyāsamanupaśyata evaṃ bhavati cittamātramevaitat sarvaṃ na punarbāhyo 'rthā vipadyate / tadevam-
T04bsa047_u:536: tatra yaccittamātraṃ tadapyasati grāhye grāhako na yukto grāhakasya grāhyapekṣatvad tataścittaṃ grāhyagrāhakaviviktam advayameva cittamiti vicārayed
T04bsa047_u:540: evaṃ cittamātramatikramya tadapi dvayanirābhasaṃ yajjñānaṃ tadatikrameta /
T04bsa047_u:541: svataḥ parato bhāvānāṃ janmānupapatteḥ grāhyagrāhakayoścālīkatve tadavyatirekāt tasyāpi satyatvamayuktamiti vicārayet /
T04bsa047_u:546: tathā cādvayajñānanirābhāse jñāne yadā sthito yogī tadā paramatattve sthitatvāt,
T04bsa047_u:548: etadeva tat mahāyānam ucyate yat paramatattvadarśanam /
T04bsa047_u:549: etadeva tat paramatattvadarśanaṃ yat sarvadharmān prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayataḥ samyagjñānāvaloke satyadarśanam /
T04bsa047_u:552: atredṛśamevādarśanamabhipretaṃ na tu nimīlitākṣajātyandhānāmiva pratyayavaikalyād amanasikārato vā yadadarśanam /
T04bsa047_u:554: tato bhāvābhiniveśadiviparyāsavāsanāyā aprahīṇatvād asaṃjñisamāpattyādivyutthitasyeva punarapi bhāvābhiniveśamūlasya rāgādikleśagaṇasyotpatteramukta eva yogī bhavet /
T04bsa047_u:557: tatrāpi prajñayā nirūpayato yo 'nupalambhaḥ sa tatrāmanasikāro 'bhipreto na manasikārābhāvamātram /
T04bsa047_u:558: na hyasaṃjñisamāpattyādiriva anādikāliko rūpādyabhiniveśo manasikāraparivarjanamātrāt prahīyate /
T04bsa047_u:559: saṃśayā prahāṇe tu na pūrvopalabdheṣu ca rūpādiṣvabhiniveśamanasikāraparivarjanaṃ śakyaṃ kartum agnyaparivarjane dāhāparivarjanavat /
T04bsa047_u:560: tathāmī rūpādimithyāvikalpāḥ kaṇṭakādivadutkīlya na hastena cetaso 'panetavyāḥ /
T04bsa047_u:562: tacca saṃśayabījaṃ yoginaḥ samādhyāloke sati prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayatastesāṃ rūpādīnāṃ pūrvopalabdhānām upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānām anupalambhād,
T04bsa047_u:565: tathā saṃśayabījāpagamād rūpādinimittamanasikāraḥ śakyate varjayituṃ nānyathā /
T04bsa047_u:566: anyathā hyasati samādhyāloke prajñācakṣuṣāpyanavaloke yathā andhakūpāvasthitapuruṣasyāvacarakagataghāṭādiṣviva yogino rūpādiṣvastitvasaṃśayo naiva nivarteta /
T04bsa047_u:567: tadanivṛttyā cā prahīṇatimiradoṣasyeva yo 'yukto 'līkarūpādyabhiniveśaḥ pravarteta na kenāpi nivartyeta /
T04bsa047_u:568: tasmāt samādhihastena manaḥ sandhāya sūkṣmataraprajñāśastreṇa tatra cetasi rūpādimithyāvikalpabījam uddharet /
T04bsa047_u:570: taravo bhūmernirmūlatayā mithyāvikalpāḥ punaścetasi na virohanti /
T04bsa047_u:571: ata evāvaraṇaprahāṇāya śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhavāhī mārgo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭaḥ,
T04bsa047_u:574: śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya samādhilābhāḥ samādhilābhācca hi prajñābhāvanā /
T04bsa047_u:575: prajñayā jñānaṃ bhavati viśuddhaṃ viśuddhajñānasya hi śīlasampat // iti /
T04bsa047_u:576: tathā hi yadā śamathenālambane cittaṃ sthirīkṛtaṃ bhavati tadā prajñayā vicārayataḥ samyagjñānāloka utpadyate,
T04bsa047_u:581: sa ca samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti vacanādekāntena prajñānukūla eva bhavati,
T04bsa047_u:582: na tu viruddhastasmāt syāt samāhitasya prajñayā nirūpayataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanupalambhaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:587: tathā hi yadā prajñayā nirūpayan na kiñcid bhāvasvabhāvam upalabhate yogī,
T04bsa047_u:592: yadā tu kālatraye 'pi bhāvo yoginā prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayatā nopalabdhaḥ,
T04bsa047_u:594: evamanye 'pi vikalpāstadā tasya na samutpadyanta eva bhāvābhāvavikalpābhyāṃ (Bhk 189)
T04bsa047_u:598: tatra sthitasya yoginaḥ sarvavikalpānām astaṃgamāt samyak kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca prahīyate /
T04bsa047_u:599: tathā hi kleśāvaraṇasyānutpannāniruddhabhāveṣu bhāvādiviparyāso mūlaṃ kāraṇam āryasatyadvayanirdeśādau varṇitaṃ bhagavatā /
T04bsa047_u:600: anena ca yogābhyāsena sarvabhāvādivikalpānāṃ prahāṇāt sakalabhāvādiviparyāsasyāvidyāsvabhāvasya kleśāvaraṇamūlasya prahāṇam /
T04bsa047_u:616: yaśca yoniśaḥ prayuktaḥ tasyātmasamāropo na bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:617: yasyātmasamāropo na bhavati tasya dṛṣṭiparyutthānaṃ na bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:618: yāvat paramārthato nirvāṇadṛṣṭisarva dṛṣṭiparyutthānam api na bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:619: tasyaivam anutpādavihāriṇaḥ kleśā atyantaṃ vinītā draṣṭavyāḥ /
T04bsa047_u:622: kleśān nirābhāsena jñānena paramārthato 'tyantaśūnyān atyantābhāvān atyantanirnimittāt prajānāti,
T04bsa047_u:629: ya kleśānāṃ gotraṃ prajānāti tasya kleśāḥ praśāmyanti /
T04bsa047_u:632: āha- yāvad eṣā paramārthato 'tyantājātānutpannābhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu kalpanā idaṃ kleśānāṃ gotram” iti vistaraḥ /
T04bsa047_u:634: tatprahāṇe sakalaviparyāsaprahāṇād jñeyāvaraṇam apyanena samyak prahīyate,
T04bsa047_u:636: jñeyāvaraṇe ca prahīṇe pratibandhābhāvād ravikiraṇavad apagatameghādyāvaraṇe nabhasi sarvatrāvyāhato yogi pratyakṣo jñānālokaḥ pravartate /
T04bsa047_u:638: tacca saṃnihitam api vastu pratibandhasadbhāvānna prakāśayati /
T04bsa047_u:640: acintyaśaktiviśeṣalābhāt kimiti sakalam eva vastu yathāvad na prakāśayet /
T04bsa047_u:641: ataḥ saṃvṛtiparamārtharūpeṇa sakalasya vastuno yathāvat parijñānāt sarvajñatvam avāpyate /
T04bsa047_u:642: ato 'yam evāvaraṇaprahāṇo sarvajñatvādhigame ca paramo mārgaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:643: yastu śrāvakādīnāṃ mārgastena viparyāsāprahāṇān na samyag āvaraṇadvayaṃ prahīyate /
T04bsa047_u:644: tathā coktam āryalaṅkāvatāre- “anye tu kāraṇādhīnān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvānirvāṇe 'pi nirvāṇam iti buddhayo bhavanti /
T04bsa047_u:650: ata eva cānyena mārgeṇa mokṣābhāvād ekam eva yānam uktaṃ bhagavatā /
T04bsa047_u:653: na tvātmāstīti bhāvayan śrāvakaḥ pudgalanairātmyam avatarati,
T04bsa047_u:663: sā ceyaṃ yoginām avasthā kuto viśodhitā? ityāha-
T04bsa047_u:666: tataḥ praṇidhānabalād uttarottaradānādikuśalābhyāsāt sā tathā viśuddhā jāta,
T04bsa047_u:667: yena sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatājñāne 'pi sakalasattvāpekṣā na vyāvartate yāvat saṃsāra eva ananuliptāḥ saṃsāradoṣairavatiṣṭhanta iti /
T04bsa047_u:669: jñānaṃ nirātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāsena paśyati / iti /
T04bsa047_u:670: yasmād yad advayalakṣaṇaṃ jñānam advayavādināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ paramārthenābhimataṃ tadapi nirātmakaṃ niḥsvabhāvam advayanirābhāsena jñānena paśyati yogī /
T04bsa047_u:678: kintu saṃvṛtyā yathā rūpādīviṣayākārajñānotpādamātreṇa vijñānameva loke tathā tathā vyavahriyate devadatto yajñadattaṃ jñānena paśyatīti na tu kaścid ātmādirasti /
T04bsa047_u:679: tathātrāpi jñānamevādvayajñānanirābhāsam utpadyamānaṃ tathā vyapadiśyate nirābhāsena jñānena paśyatiti /
T04bsa047_u:680: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi saṃvṛtyā yogijñānam anyad vā pṛthagjñānaṃ neṣṭam /
T04bsa047_u:681: tathā coktam āryasatyadvayanirdeśe- “paramārthato 'tyantābhāvaśca saṃvṛttyā ca mārga bhāvayati” iti /
T04bsa047_u:683: kintu yasya saṃvṛtyāpi kāraṇaṃ nāsti sa saṃvṛtyāpi notpadyate /
T04bsa047_u:685: yasya tu [kāraṇaṃ] vidyate sa paramārthato 'līko 'pi samutpadyata eva /
T04bsa047_u:687: na ca māyādeḥ saṃvṛtyā pratītyasamutpāde paramārthato vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ,
T04bsa047_u:690: tatra yathā kleśakarmamāyāvaśāt sattvānāṃ janmamāyā pravarteta,
T04bsa047_u:691: tathā yogināmapi puṇyajñānasambhāramāyāvaśād yogijñānamāyā pravartata eva /
T04bsa047_u:700: te hi māyākāravat tāṃ māyāṃ yathāvat parijñānāt satyato nābhiniviśante, (Bhk 193)
T04bsa047_u:702: ye tāṃ bālapṛthagjanavat kautūhalaṃ styatvenābhiniviṣṭāste viparītābhiniveśad bāla ucyante iti sarvamaviruddham /
T04bsa047_u:705: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
T04bsa047_u:709: tatra ca layauddhatyādīn vyutthitān pūrvavat praśamayet /
T04bsa047_u:710: yadā tu sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatālambane ca layauddhatyādirahitam anabhisaṃskāreṇa pravṛttaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati,
T04bsa047_u:712: tathā yāvat śaknoti tāvad adhimuktibalena adhimukticaryābhūmau sthito bhāvayet /
T04bsa047_u:713: tato yathecchaṃ paryaṅkamābhujya vyutthāya punarevaṃ cintayet /
T04bsa047_u:714: yadi nāmāmī dharmāḥ paramārthata eva niḥsvabhāvā apyete saṃvṛtyā sthitā eva /
T04bsa047_u:715: tathā coktam āryaratnameghe- “kathaṃ bodhisattvo nairātmyakuśalo bhavati?
T04bsa047_u:722: evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ nopalabhate,
T04bsa047_u:725: ayaṃ ca paramārthato 'nutpādavihāriṇyāḥ prajñāyā na punarvyāvahārikeṇa svabhāvena” iti vistaraḥ /
T04bsa047_u:726: ete ca bālabuddhaya evaṃ niḥsvabhāveṣu bhāveṣu (Bhk 194)
T04bsa047_u:727: viparītābhiniveśāt saṃsāre paribhramanto vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti /
T04bsa047_u:728: mahākaruṇām eva āmukhīkṛtya evamanuvicintayet- tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā sarvajñatvaṃ prāpya eteṣāṃ dharmatāmavabodhayeyamiti /
T04bsa047_u:731: tathā coktam āryadharmasaṃgītau- “yathābhūtadarśino bodhisattvasya sattveṣu mahākaruṇā pravartate /
T04bsa047_u:732: evaṃ cāsya bhavati- idaṃ mayā samādhimukhaṃ sarvadharmayathābhūtadarśaṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ nispādayitavyam /
T04bsa047_u:733: sa tayā mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamāno 'dhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣātrayaṃ paripūryānuttaraṃ samyaksambodhim abhisambudhyate” iti /
T04bsa047_u:734: ayameva prajñopāyayuganaddhabāhī bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo yat paramārthadarśane 'pi saṃvṛtiṃ nocchedayanti /
T04bsa047_u:735: saṃvṛtiṃ cānucchedayanto mahākaruṇāpūrvaṅgamā aviparyastā eva sattvārthakriyāsu pravartante /
T04bsa047_u:741: na ca taddhetukaṃ tannidānaṃ tatpratyayam ucchedadṛṣṭau patati” iti /
T04bsa047_u:750: sā mayā (Bhk 195) pratipattiḥ pratipattavyā sarvasattvānāṃ hitāvahā sukhāvahā /
T04bsa047_u:751: tasya skandheṣu māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca skandhaparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /
T04bsa047_u:752: dhātuṣvāśīviṣavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca dhātuparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /
T04bsa047_u:754: rūpasya phenapiṇḍavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatarūpakāyaviṭhapanāṃ jahāti /
T04bsa047_u:755: vedanāyā budbudvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatadhyānasamādhisamāpattisukhaniṣpadanaprayogaṃ nārabhate /
T04bsa047_u:756: saṃjñāyāṃ marīcivat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatajñānaniṣpādana apratipattiḥ /
T04bsa047_u:757: saṃskārāṇāṃ kadalīvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca buddhadharmasaṃskārāṇām apratipattiḥ /
T04bsa047_u:758: vijñānasya māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca jñānapūrvaṅgamakāyavāṅmanaskarmaniṣpādanā pratipattiḥ” iti vistaraḥ /
T04bsa047_u:760: tatra yadi nāma lokottaraprajñāvasthāyām upāyasevanā na sambhavati,
T04bsa047_u:761: upāyasevanākāle tu bodhisattvasya māyākāravad aviparyastatvāt lokottarajñānāt prayogapṛṣṭhabhāvani yathāvad vastuparamārthatattvābhiniveśanī
T04bsa047_u:764: evamanena krameṇa bodhisattvasya prajñām upāyaṃ ca satataṃ satkṛtya dīrghakālābhyāsena bhāvayato dvādaśāvasthāviśeṣā bhavanti /
T04bsa047_u:771: asyāmapi bhūmau vartamāno bodhisattva pṛthagjano 'pi sarvabālavipattisamatikrānto 'saṃkhyeyasamādhidhāraṇīvimokṣābhijñādiguṇānvita āryaratnameghe paṭhyate /
T04bsa047_u:772: asyā eva ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrādhimātratarāvasthācatuṣṭayena catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni vyavasthāpyante /

T04bsa047_u:1592: tadāstīti na vikalpayati nāstīti na vikalpayati /

T04bsa047_u:1597: evamanye vikalpāstasya tadānīṃ na santi eva,

T04bsa047_u:1621: tataḥ punaḥ tatraiva tattve cittānabhisaṃskāravāhitāyāṃ yatnaṃ kurvīta /
